name: Invisible Colors
description:
A co-op platformer made for the Multiplayer Jam. In this game, certain objects are hidden for each player. Player 1 can only see pink objects, and Player 2 can only see blue objects. Use your cursor to reveal parts of the level to the other player to help them pass the level.

Controls: Arrow keys to move and Up to jump

Sound Effect Credits:

  • Platformer Jump by dklon
  • Jump Land by MentalSanityOff
  • Portal Sound by IgnasD
